TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticablePrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal

summary.span: 封裝可以驗證的主體共通的帳戶和連絡資料。

span.span: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 這個建構函式是由衍生的類別建構函式所呼叫，以初始化基礎類別，而且不適合直接使用於您的程式碼中。

span.span: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從衍生的類別建構函式來初始化基底類別，衍生自這個類別的自訂延伸模組類別可以呼叫這個建構函式。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[主體延伸](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

summary.span: 取得或設定可為 Null 的 ，指定帳戶到期的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

value.span: ，指定帳戶到期的日期和時間，如果帳戶永不到期則為 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同所有中的屬性，傳回的時間為 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要將它轉換為本地時間，呼叫方法傳回的物件。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object. 當您將，時間將會預設為 UTC。When you set the , the time will default to UTC. 如果您想要撰寫以本地時間，然後指定屬性您物件當做。If you want to write in local time, then specify the property of your object as .

exception.span: 基礎存放區不支援這個屬性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

Public ReadOnly Property AccountLockoutTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountLockoutTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: 取得可為 Null 的 ，指定鎖定帳戶的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

value.span: ，指定鎖定帳戶的日期和時間，如果帳戶未設定鎖定時間則為 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帳戶鎖定的時間系統而定，但無法設定帳戶管理 api。The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API. 若要解除鎖定帳戶，使用方法。To unlock the account, use the method. 可能的帳戶可能不會鎖定時傳回非 null 值。It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the returns a non-null value. 應用程式應該使用方法，以判斷是否有此帳戶已鎖定。Applications should use the method to determine whether the account is locked out. 如同所有中的屬性，傳回的時間為 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要將它轉換為本地時間，呼叫方法傳回的物件。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object.

exception.span: 基礎存放區不支援這個屬性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public Nullable<bool> Enabled { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> Enabled
Public Property Enabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Enabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可為 Null 的布林值，這個值指定是否已針對此帳戶啟用驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

value.span: 如果已啟用主體則為 ，如果帳戶未保存則為 null，否則為 。

span.span: if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主體未保存存放區中，這個屬性會傳回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 保存主體之後，預設啟用的設定取決於存放區。After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store. AD DS 和 AD LDS 存放區時停用新的主體會將它們保存，而 SAM 時將它們保存可讓新的主體。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted. 應用程式只能設定此屬性的值之後已保存存放區中。The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.

exception.span: 基礎存放區不支援這個屬性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

exception.span: 應用程式嘗試針對這個屬性設定 null 值。

span.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

Public Sub ExpirePasswordNow ()

summary.span: 使這個帳戶的密碼到期。

span.span: Expires the password for this account.

summary.span: 這會強制使用者在下一次登入時變更密碼。

span.span: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以強制要求使用者在下次登入時變更密碼。Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.

exception.span: 將變更儲存至存放區時，就會發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
